CustomField.formula:
( VALUE(TEXT(Technicality__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Storytelling_Sales_Focused__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Content_Flow_Defined_Followed__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Followed_Client_Requests_Project_Notes__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Technicality_Design__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Designed_From_a_Sales_Perspective__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Cohesive_with_Brand_and_Past_Pieces__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Overall_look_Anything_Missed__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Technicality_Video__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Produced_from_a_Sales_Perspective__c))+ VALUE(TEXT(Cohesive_with_Brand_Past_Pieces_Video__c))+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Copywriter_Content_Engaging__c, 'NA' ), 0, VALUE(TEXT(Copywriter_Content_Engaging__c)) )+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Editor_Information_Correct__c , 'NA' ), 0, VALUE(TEXT(Editor_Information_Correct__c )) )+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Designer_Design_Engaging__c , 'NA' ), 0, VALUE(TEXT(Designer_Design_Engaging__c )) )+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Marketing_Manager_Client_Wants_Represent__c , 'NA' ), 0, VALUE(TEXT(Marketing_Manager_Client_Wants_Represent__c )) )+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Producer_Production_Engaging__c , 'NA' ), 0, VALUE(TEXT(Producer_Production_Engaging__c)) ) )/
(55+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Copywriter_Content_Engaging__c, 'NA' ), 0, 5 )+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Editor_Information_Correct__c , 'NA' ), 0, 5 )+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Designer_Design_Engaging__c , 'NA' ), 0, 5 )+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Marketing_Manager_Client_Wants_Represent__c , 'NA' ), 0, 5 )+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Producer_Production_Engaging__c , 'NA' ), 0, 5 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Parts 1-6, but averages to 100% with or without Part 5 or Part 6
CustomField.label: Overall Collateral Score
